Class PIPFinderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacml.api.pip.PIPFinderFactory
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    StdPIPFinderFactory

    public abstract class PIPFinderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    PIPFinderFactory is the factory class for getting the configured PIPFinder.
